# VEHICLE::OVERRIDE_PLANE_DAMAGE_THREHSOLD

## Summary
Overrides the plane damage threshold (currently 900). Reset the override by passing in zero

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **FLOAT** value

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Used for helis.
